title: Buffalo Bills Mobile
description:
Welcome to the official mobile app of the Buffalo Bills, presented by M&T Bank and tailor-made for the most passionate and knowledgeable fanbase in the NFL. Stay locked in with exclusive team content all year long and make game day go smoothly with mobile ticketing. Plus, score live streaming video, breaking news, real-time statistics and drive updates, and on-demand highlights!
Features include:
Game day: Mobile ticketing
News: Real-time breaking news, previews of upcoming matchups, postgame recaps and
player features
Video: Live streaming video, on-demand highlights, feature stories, press conferences, coach and player interviews, and more
Photos: Stunning HQ galleries from games and practices
Audio: Official team podcasts and interviews
Stats: Real-time statistics and scores from the official NFL stats engine, head-to-head matchup insights, player stats, drive updates, box scores and league-wide stats
Standings: Division and conference standings
Depth chart: Up-to-date offense, defense and special teams
Schedule: Schedule of upcoming games, box scores from previous games, ticket purchases for future games
For more Bills news and info, visit www.buffalobills.com
For support: Tweet @yinzcam or email support@yinzcam.com
The official mobile app of the Buffalo Bills presented by M&T Bank is created and maintained by YinzCam, Inc., on behalf of the Buffalo Bills.
